2016302580176 唐振霆
P1.
11101
01100
10010
11011
11000

P4
a)  1-10
   00000001 00000010
  +00000011 00000100
  +00000101 00000110
  +00000111 00001000
  +00001001 00001010
  =00011001 00011110

sum is 11100110 11100001

b)  B-K
   01000010 01000011
  +01000100 01000101
  +01000110 01000111
  +01001000 01001001
  +01001010 01001011 
  =10011111 10100100

sum is 01100000 01011011

c)  b-k
    01100010 01100011
   +01100100 01100101
   +01100110 01100111
   +01101000 01101001
   +01101010 01101011
   =00000000 00000101
sum is 11111111 11111010


P5
   10101010100000 / 10011 = 1011011100  R=0100

P6
a) R=0000
b) R=1111
c) R=1001

P8
a)E(p) = Np[(1-p)^(N-1)]
  E'(p) = N[(1-p)^(N-1)] -N(N-1)p[(1-p)^(N-2)]
        = N[(1-p)^(N-2)][(1-p)-(N-1)p]
        = N[(1-p)^(N-2)](1-Np)
when p->1/N E'(p) -> 0  
E(p) is max
p=1/n

b)p=1/n
  E(p)=(1-1/N)^(N-1)
      = [(1-1/N)^N]/(1-1/N)
  if N->∞, lim(1-1/N)^N =1/e, lim(1-1/N)=1
	so limE(1/N)=1/e
